title: Lilith
description: Alex Williams has battled demons all her life. Now Lilith, the mother of all demon kind, has declared war on the human race.To defeat the immortal succubus, Alex must lay aside her hatred and work with two half-demons, Colwyn and Jacob. Alex and Colwyn are prepared to destroy each other at the first sign of treachery. What they donâ€™t expect is the passion that overcomes them. To defeat Lilith, Alex must embrace what she believes profane and trust the half-demon who might turn against her at any moment.
author: Tamara Jock
